bRigid
Class BObject

java.lang.Object
  bRigid.BObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
BInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBox, BCompound, BConvexHull, BGImpactMesh, BSphere, BTerrain
public class BObject
extends Object
implements BInterface

BObject is the basic RigidBody Object, all other RigidBodies extend BObject and inherent all attributes ConstructionInfo by Richard Brauer -- http://www.r6753.com
